title: Blom on turn of the century

content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Identify one piece of evidence that Blom uses to support his overall characterization of the period described in the passage. b) Identify one piece of evidence that would support Blom’s assertion regarding the creation of new identities. c) Explain one cultural effect in Europe of the developments described in the passage.

frqParts.text: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. a) Identify one piece of evidence that Blom uses to support his overall characterization of the period described in the passage. b) Identify one piece of evidence that would support Blom’s assertion regarding the creation of new identities. c) Explain one cultural effect in Europe of the developments described in the passage.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
